name: Tesla's Electric Mist
blurb: Point-and-click adventure: The mysterious Nikola Tesla, a time traveling device, and an experiment gone wrong in Colorado Springs

rewards.reward: A special IOS version of the game.
Digital Copy of the Art Book and a special IOS version of the game.
Digital Copy of the Music Soundtrack, and a Digital Copy of the Art Book, and a special IOS version of the game.
A Signed Poster, Digital Copy of the Music Soundtrack, and a Digital Copy of the Art Book, and a special IOS version of the game. (International orders please add $10 to pledge.)

A physical CD of the Music Soundtrack, Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), a Signed Poster, and a Digital Copy of the Art Book, and a special IOS version of the game.  (International orders please add $10 to pledge.)

A Tesla's Electric Mist T-Shirt, Listed as a Backer in the Credits, A physical CD of the Music Soundtrack, Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), a Signed Poster, and a Digital Copy of the Art Book, and a special IOS version of the game.  (International orders please add $15 to pledge.)

Art Book physical copy, T-Shirt, CD physical copy of music soundtrack, Listed as a Backer in the Credits, Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), and a Signed Poster, and a special IOS version of the game.  (International orders please add $15 to pledge.)

A Tesla's Electric Mist military style printed Hat, a Making of DVD with behind the scenes images and interviews, a personalized Sketch of your face and name listing you as a "Tesla Friend" in the Credits, a physical copy of the Art Book, the T-Shirt, CD physical copy of music soundtrack,  Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), and a Signed Poster, and a special IOS version of the game.  (International orders please add $15 to pledge.)

Your face on one of the towns folk in Colorado Springs, the Tesla's Electric Mist military style printed Hat, a Making of DVD with behind the scenes images and interviews, a personalized Sketch of your face and name listing you as a "Tesla Friend" in the Credits, a physical copy of the Art Book, the T-Shirt, CD physical copy of music soundtrack,  Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), and a Signed Poster, and a special IOS version of the game.

A store in the game will be named after you, you will be Listed in Credits as an Associate Producer, the Tesla's Electric Mist military style printed Hat, a Making of DVD with behind the scenes images and interviews, a physical copy of the Art Book, the T-Shirt, CD physical copy of music soundtrack,  Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), and a Signed Poster, and a special IOS version of the game.

A custom song will be composed for you and hidden in the game along with a special note as an easter egg, you will be Listed in Credits as an Associate Producer, the Tesla's Electric Mist military style printed Hat, a Making of DVD with behind the scenes images and interviews, a physical copy of the Art Book, the T-Shirt, CD physical copy of music soundtrack,  Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), and a Signed Poster, and a special IOS version of the game.

A custom Ceramic Sculpture of our in-game Tesla symbol, a custom song will be composed for you and hidden in the game along with a special note as an easter egg, a store in the game will be named after you, your face on one of the towns folk ghosts, you will be Listed in Credits as an Associate Producer, the Tesla's Electric Mist military style printed Hat, a Making of DVD with behind the scenes images and interviews, a physical copy of the Art Book, the T-Shirt, CD physical copy of music soundtrack,  Beta Test Participation (limited to first 50), and a Signed Poster, and a special IOS version of the game.
